subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=たい
|kanon=たい
|kanyoon=た, だ, だい
|kun=ふと, ふと-い, ふと-む, ふと-やか, ふと-る
|nanori=おお, たか, ひろ, ふとし
}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Synonyms
Prefix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|ふと|prefix}}

# added to words describing [[god]]s or the [[emperor]] or other [[exalted]] subjects to denote [[greatness]] or [[excellence]]
#* {{RQ:Manyoshu|17|4031}}; [http://etext.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man17Yo.html text here]
#*: 奈加等美乃 敷刀能里⟨等其⟩等 伊比波良倍 安⟨賀⟩布伊能知毛 多我多米尓奈礼
#*:: 中臣の '''太'''祝詞言 言ひ祓へ 贖ふ命も 誰がために汝れ
#*:: なかとみの '''ふと'''のりとごと いひはらへ あかふいのちも たがためになれ
#*:: ''Nakatomi no / '''futo'''noritogoto / iiharae / akau inochi mo / ta ga tame ni nare''
#*:: Reciting the Nakatomi's '''excellent''' ritual offering, whose [long] life was prayed for? Yours.
# added to regular nouns to denote [[fatness]] or [[thickness]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''太'''腿、'''太'''箸|'''ふと'''-もも、'''ふと'''-ばし|the thigh (the '''thick''' part of the leg), '''fat''' chopsticks (used at New Years)}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 2
subSections.text: The {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ふとし}} {{m|ja|終止形|tr=shūshikei||[[terminal]] (sentence-final) form}} of adjective {{m|ja|太い|tr=futoi||fat, thick, big}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text: Derived from the root word {{m|ja|大|tr=ō||great, big}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|太%陰|たい%いん}}: the [[moon]]
* {{ja-r|太%陰%暦|たい%いん%れき}}: the [[lunar calendar]]
* {{ja-r|太%陽|たい%よう}}: the [[sun]]
* {{ja-r|太%虚|たい%きょ}}: the [[sky]]
* {{ja-r|太%極%拳|たい%きょく%けん}}: [[tai chi]], [[taijiquan]]
* {{ja-r|太%空|たい%くう}}: the [[sky]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|太%原|^たい%げん}}: the Chinese city of [[Taiyuan]]
* {{ja-r|太%古|たい%こ}}: [[ancient]] [[times]]
* {{ja-r|太%鼓|たい%こ}}: a traditional fat Japanese [[drum]]
* {{ja-r|太%鼓%橋|たい%こ%ばし}}: an [[arched]] [[bridge]]
* {{ja-r|太%鼓%腹|たい%こ%ばら}}: a [[paunch]]
* {{ja-r|太%子|たい%し}}: the [[crown prince]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 5
subSections.text: From a colloquial form of {{lang|zh|太}} in Middle Chinese. Compare the similar corruption in Mandarin {{zh-l|大}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
